item.description: Session 1 [[Innadel]] or [[Leradel]] Arrived at [[Innadel]] Met [[Breeze]] Went to the local tavern and question Breeze who was suspicious Archie notices guards outside the church Qidan scouts as a Bat We go and investigate FOR NO REASON EXCEPT NOSY Hostage situation Big fight Find letter with Black Seal with a monkey on From [[The Syndicate]] initiating the church into the fold Told to meet at [[Innadel#Badger Hill]] Go to [[Innadel#Badger Hill]] Get trapped by [[Lady Xiao]] CLIFFHANGER

Session 2 [[Innadel#Badger Hill]] mages start filling the holes with CloudKill Rescue the hippogriffs and [[Percival]] moonfluff beaky prometheus cloudfleather Big battle on Badger Hill On the bodies found necklace diamond shape green gem in the center used for spell channeling. Archibald maims [[La Qua]] La Qua I am just following orders “You were asking questions about where she is from” RE: [[Lady Xiao]] If you take me with you I will get you into her Mansion We kill him

Fang - used crystal, lasted for a week, but wolfkin had gone when he had got back Reigning lady of Mitts High tea society fleeing - covered in dust - to the south Ghost rebellion - mousekin and wolfkin kicked out - attempting to retake the city. An army (all) led by General Howlington I ARRIVED LATE Travelling to [[Ofheise]] On travelling we view a tear caused by the multi fang Fangs mom is at [[Ghost]] ready to attack [[Qidan]] dreams of a woman in all red who attempts to attack him Arrive at [[Ofheise]] Buys some shoes Go to the local tavern to find out about [[Lady Xiao]] Talks about [[Rauthei]] and a delivery from a rabbit person Archi got a tattoo Went to the stables Daria made the stable boy Qidan made friends with the horse Horse info - [[Lady Xiao]] has a a tail which is long and thin and can pick up items Fight on the bridge against zombies Met [[Morie Destroyer of Worlds]] which can talk
